text:
Hello! My name is Pedro Sánchez and I'm from a little city in the southeast of Spain called Caravaca de la Cruz.
I did a BSc in Biotechnology from 2015 to 2019 and then I decided to learn more about data analysis so I entered in the MSc in Biostatistics I'm currently finishing.
Although I feel more at home with R, I've decided to learn Julia more deeply. Hope to see lot of good knowledge and kind people in this slack :smiley:

text: Hello! Be sure to subscribe to <#CAKKFNYLD|biology> and <#C6821M4KE|statistics>, and don't hesistate to ask questions in <#C6A044SQH|helpdesk>

text: You probably already know about the it, but it seems like the R - Julia interop packages in both directions work pretty well. Both great communities!
